Step into the charming world of Super Auto Pets, a delightful strategy game where you raise and battle adorable pets in epic competitions. Build your team, upgrade your pets, and outsmart your opponents to become the ultimate champion in this addictive and fun-filled game.

How to Control the Game

PC/Laptop Controls:

  • Mouse: Click and drag to move pets and interact with the game interface.

Touchscreen Devices Controls:

  • Tap: Tap and swipe to navigate menus and interact with pets.

How to Play Super Auto Pets

Game Setup:

  1. Build Your Team: Start by selecting pets to form your team. Choose wisely, as each pet has unique abilities and strengths.
  2. Arrange Your Formation: Strategically position your pets on the grid to maximize their effectiveness in battles.

Gameplay:

  • Battle Opponents: Engage in turn-based battles against other players’ teams.
  • Upgrade Pets: Earn coins during battles to upgrade your pets and unlock new abilities.
  • Adapt Your Strategy: Adjust your team composition and formation based on your opponents’ choices and the outcome of battles.

Tips and Tricks:

  • Diversify Your Team: Include pets with different abilities and roles to cover various strategies.
  • Manage Resources: Spend coins wisely on upgrades and new pets to maintain a balanced team.
  • Observe Opponents: Pay attention to your opponents’ strategies and adjust your own accordingly.
  • Practice Regularly: Improve your skills through practice and experimentation with different team compositions.

Meet the Developer

Super Auto Pets is developed by Duel Drink, an indie game development studio known for creating innovative and engaging games that blend strategy and humor.

Available Platforms

Super Auto Pets is available to play on the following platforms:

  • Web Browsers: Access the game through web browsers on PC or laptop.
